localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: This is an iOS Clubhouse Bio Builder. You get 70 supported fonts, a large text box editor, it's stupid easy to understand, and most importantly it's FREE!
nodes.title: Clubhouse Bio Builder - Craft your bio and immediately get more followers
nodes.author: abasa

nodes.excerpt: Mirror iPhone/iPad to your Mac wirelessly. No need to connect iPhone/iPad to Mac with a cable. Demo what's on your iPhone/iPad in online meeting, play games, draw live. PhoneCast is a universal purchase app so you buy once and use it on iPhone, iPad and Mac.
nodes.title: PhoneCast - Mirror iPhone or iPad screen to Mac without wires
nodes.author: Pawan Dixit

nodes.excerpt: Bunches is the easiest way to start free or paid group chats about anything! Start your Bunch, invite friends, get discovered and get paid when members subscribe. Sign up now on web or iOS to start your Bunch and discover new communities to join!
nodes.title: Bunches - Start and discover free or paid group chats about anything
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Share your images, not your secrets. Black Highlighter makes it easy to hide text you donâ€™t want to share in images youâ€™re going to share anyway. Hide peopleâ€™s names, e-mail addresses, and more with just a quick scribble.
nodes.title: Black Highlighter - Share your images not your secrets
nodes.author: Geoff Pado

nodes.excerpt: Text Compare lets you instantly see the difference between two pieces of text. Compare text by paragraph, word or character. Paste in two pieces of text, and Text Compare will highlight what has been inserted in, or deleted from, the original text.
nodes.title: Text Compare - Instantly see the difference between two pieces of text
nodes.author: Alastair Byrne

nodes.excerpt: Just as the Trello board revolutionized team collaboration by making it visual, simple, and fun for anyone, Trelloâ€™s new views are taking teamwork to places never seen before.
nodes.title: The New Trello - Going beyond the board
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Writing your negative thoughts down on a piece of paper and then discarding them can help you find peace. Thought Detox brings this experience to your iPhone, letting you write out your thoughts and then release them â€” without storing or sending them anywhere.
nodes.title: Thought Detox - Private notes to clear your mind

nodes.excerpt: About BebeSleep - Free offering of some 60 different pieces of white noise for your baby to enter into sleep - Premium sound sources to restore your baby's healthy sleep pattern - Soundscape from around the globe to develop your baby's hearing ability
nodes.title: BebeSleep - BebeSleep is dedicated to helping your baby sleep
nodes.author: Yongwon Lee

nodes.excerpt: Todayist helps busy folks fit what matters most into their day. Prioritize your goals, tasks, and most importantly: YOURSELF. Stay inspired with bite-sized activities tailored to you. Download on iOS and Android to live your life with purpose.ğŸ’š
nodes.title: Todayist - Your friendly planning tool to make the most of every day

nodes.title: Aqueux Wallpapers - A collection of dynamic wallpapers, for desktop and mobile

nodes.excerpt: Editable gives you the simplest way to make your videos intuitively annotated and easily marked up. Contrary to high-quality design editors like Photoshopâ€™s paint brush or Final Cut Proâ€™s screen management, it just provides simple annotation experiences.
nodes.title: Editable - Annotate directly on any video files

nodes.excerpt: Share content and connect to people you love on Hive. You can express yourself with our customizable Music Section. There's featured content, trending hashtags, and a list of topics on our Explore page. You can even Repost, share, and reply to posts with Gifs.
nodes.title: Hive Social - Instagram's replacement
nodes.author: Gabe Perez

nodes.excerpt: On Nugget youâ€™re the DJ of your own audio station. You can pull audio from all over the internet and add your voice to create a station about anything that interests you. You can also leave audio comments on your friendsâ€™ posts.
nodes.title: Nugget - Share and record audio with your friends

nodes.excerpt: Pexels gives you unlimited access to over 3 million free, high-resolution photos and videos â€“ now available at your fingertips anywhere you go with a newly re-designed app.
nodes.title: Pexels App 2.0 - 3M+ completely free photos and videos in one app
nodes.author: Bruno Joseph

nodes.excerpt: Duet makes it really easy to record and remix music asynchronously with your friends and the world. This is in limited beta, feedback welcome!
nodes.title: Duet - Record music asynchronously really easily
nodes.author: Mikey

nodes.excerpt: The internet isn't one size fits all, your mobile browser shouldn't be either. With Insight, create extensions easily and quickly on your phone, and we suggest the most useful ones as you browse. Search only sources you trust; block ads, trackers and junk.
nodes.title: Insight Browser - Supercharge search & browsing on iOS with no-code extensions
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Valora is a P2P payment app that allows you to send money like a text message to anyone worldwide. Powered by the Celo blockchain platform, Valora is the only wallet that enables trustless mobile transactions, with an easy-to-use UX, at near-zero fees.
nodes.title: Valora - Send money like a text message to anyone worldwide
nodes.author: Naval Ravikant

nodes.excerpt: Browse the best parts of your favorite shows, and enjoy a bite-sized method to discover new ones, via a personalized feed of 60-second highlights generated based on your existing library and interests.
nodes.title: Podz - The best parts of podcasts in a personalized feed
nodes.author: Jackson Deane

nodes.excerpt: Based on Apple official RSS feeds, Globe Topper is an iOS apps that allow you to spot your app in App Store rankings in 175 countries! The latest version also includes ratings & reviews that you can translate in your language with Google Translate.
nodes.title: Globe Topper for iOS - App Store rankings & reviews in 175 countries
nodes.author: FranÃ§ois Boulais

nodes.excerpt: Gawq unravels echo chambers by serving you algorithm-free news, hyper-focused on transparency, social impact and unbiased reporting. Compare the news, mute the noise, and read between the headlines from over 150+ media sources daily.
nodes.title: Gawq - Unbreaking news. Stay informed, mindfully.
nodes.author: Joshua Dziabiak

nodes.excerpt: Zeta Joint Cards are designed for the modern couple. Couples get a joint account and two debit cards, allowing both partners to keep tabs on their shared finances including paying bills and saving together. Our goal is to make shared banking delightful.
nodes.title: Zeta Joint Cards - Shared banking for modern couples
nodes.author: Charles Hudson

nodes.excerpt: KooKit is a breakthrough MagSafe accessory that cools your phone while keeping it wirelessly charged. It tweaks between battery life and performance of your phone to make it run at its peak state for a prolonged period of time.
nodes.title: KooKit - Keep your phone cool & wirelessly charge at the same time
